column4: ugh so i am trying to figure out all this stuff for myself .. when it comes to CVS ......... CVS is just for obtaining sources right? ... or is there a special method for compiling the sources obtained via CVS?
cvs is mostly for version control, but yes, you can get unstable source code with it
and if you get the release date right, you can get stable code with it
but as far as the source obtained with cvs ... just compile it normal?
it's a known issue with mplayer
